attributes.description:
The New futuristic looking Hyundai Staria has recently landed in South Africa, and is set to be a segment game-changer. The Staria is more spacious and high-tech than the H1 which it replaces, together with a more powerful, yet quieter 2.2L diesel engine that is mated to a new 8 speed automatic gearbox. Safety is catered for rather nicely with the inclusion of lane change assist, blind-spot monitoring, PDC front and rear, and six airbags. This Luxury specification ups the ante with the inclusion of 360 degree cameras, swivelling rear seats, adaptive cruise control, and so much more. 

Balance of Hyundai's unrivalled warranty of 7 years / 200'000 and a 6 year / 90'000km service plan.

Don't Miss Out, Call Us Today, or Leave Your Details and We Will Call You.

Finance Can Be Arranged, Nationwide Delivery, Trade-ins Welcome, Full Service History At Agents.

Price Excludes Documentation and Registration Costs E&OE

As one of the many Motus Select Pre-owned dealerships, we pride ourselves in excellent service and offer vehicles that can be trusted and enjoyed. Customer satisfaction is our main priority! 

MOTUS: Live, Love, Drive.

attributes.description:
Bring your unique touch of magic to the world every time tyre meets road in the new KONA. What you see is only a hint of what you get & what you get is plenty with a range of ingenious innovations in an SUV that isn’t afraid to be itself, stylish & driven.
Play your life’s theme songs at the touch of a button with Android Auto & Apple CarPlay. Sit comfortably behind the wheel of the KONA on artificial leather seat trims & take every trip to the next level with rear parking sensors & camera, daytime running lights & HAC (Hill Start Assist Control).
Nobody does you better than you and no SUV embraces individuality, style & colour quite like the new KONA. Set your own trend with a range of vibrant finishes and colours to choose from including Surfy Blue, Pulse Red, Atlas White, Ignite Flame, Cyber Grey and Dark Knight.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
